review_title: Good facility, good people, poor managment

Nice facility and equipment
Competent and dedicated providers (MD/DO/PA/NP)

High patient ratios
Management listened to some "efficiency expert" who tried to apply national numbers (that do NOT represent staff needed for best care, just what other facilities are doing) and reduced staffing.
